relations.detail: Wang2019_TemplateBasedSolver 使用模板方法生成数学表达式，而 Roy2015_ExpressionTree 提出了表达树的方法来构建数学表达式。Wang2019_TemplateBasedSolver 在此基础上进一步优化了表达式的生成过程。
relations.problem_addressed: 提高了多步算术问题的解决能力。
relations.evidence: we propose a template-based solution based on recursive neural network for math expression construction.

relations.detail: Seo2015_GEOS 结合文本和图表理解来解决几何问题，而 Alvin2014_ProofProblemSynthesis 则进一步扩展到自动生成几何证明问题。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了更广泛的几何问题解决方案，包括自动问题生成。
relations.evidence: This paper presents a semi-automated methodology for generating geometric proof problems of the kind found in a high-school curriculum.

relations.detail: Wang2016_VerbalIQTest 使用了 NDMC 数据集来测试其模型在解决语言理解问题上的表现。
relations.problem_addressed: 提高了对语言理解问题的解决能力。
relations.evidence: We conduct experiments on two of the largest datasets for arithmetic word problems, in which Math23K contains 23, 164 math problems and MAWPS contains 2, 373 problems.

relations.detail: Wang2016_VerbalIQTest 使用 F1 分数作为评估指标来衡量模型的表现。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一个客观的评估标准来衡量模型的性能。
relations.evidence: Experimental results have shown that the proposed framework can not only outperform existing methods for solving verbal comprehension questions but also exceed the average performance of the Amazon Mechanical Turk workers involved in the study.
